About me

My name is Ihor

Front-end developer with experience in developing various applications. I am inspired by project management and IT innovations. Proactive, sociable persistent in achieving goals and desired results. Strong analytical and decision-making skills. Customer-oriented. Responsible, and attentive to details and deadlines I do not stop there, l always try to improve my skills and be in the trend of new technologies.

    Let`s create successful responsive websites that are fast, easy to use, and built with best practices. The main area of my expertise is front-end development, HTML, CSS, JS, building small and medium web apps.

I use in my work

  • HTML5

    It's what builds the framework of your website or app, and version five will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure for your product.

    This style of language allows me to create absolutely any appearance of your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

  • Java Script

    This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, getting data from the server, and more...

  • Bootstrap

    Bootstrap is among the most popular HTML, CSS, and JS frameworks. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill to work with it is present.

  • Jquery

    Jquery library will speed up development. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill to work with it is present.

  • Word Press

    A website is a place where people come to know more about you and your product or service. With WordPress We not only create a website We create a great story together.
